document.docAuthor: Qiu, Jian-Yue, Xu, Hao & Chen, Li
document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the rare flower beetle genus Macronotops Krikken (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Cetoniinae) from Asia with biological notes

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of the rare flower beetle genus Macronotops Krikken (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Cetoniinae) from Asia with biological notes

heading.emphasis:
Key to species of the genus
Macronotops

subSubSection.paragraph: (Excluding the unnamed species from Xizang , China )

paragraph.keyLead:
- Body Wider; pygidium Without yelloW macula ( Figs. 74–75 ); outer tooth of female metatibia present ( Fig. 50 ); median lobe of male genitalia ribbon-like, longer ( Fig. 112 )...............................
M. dianensis Qiu, Xu & Chen
,
new species

7 Antenna yelloWish broWn ( Figs. 12–13 )............................
M. olivaceofuscus ( Bourgoin, 1916 )
revised status

8 Body larger, usually more than 16 mm in length; pronotum With dark broWn or black setae ( Figs. 154 , 156 ); pygidium usually With a yelloW macula ( Figs. 86, 88 ), but absent in feW individuals ( Figs. 87, 89 ); parameres longer and apex expanded ( Fig. 116 ). TaiWan Island.........................................................
M. nigropubescens ( Mikšić, 1971 )

9 Inner margin of metatibia in distal portion convex ( Figs. 152, 154 ); angles betWeen large teeth of protibia acute ( Figs. 31–32 ); membrane betWeen parameres distinct ( Fig. 115 ).......................
M. miksici Qiu, Xu & Chen
,
new species

10 Antenna yelloWish broWn ( Figs. 20–21 ); pygidium With a triangular yelloW macula ( Figs. 102–103 ); parameres longer ( Fig. 121 )............................................................
M. medogensis Qiu, Xu & Chen
,
new species
